text: @BorisJohnson YOU Need to tell the selfish numbnuts to stop putting people at risk... I have lost friends to Covid-19 I DONT WANT to loose family or more friends.. ENOUGH now slap a cerfew on them, take benefits away do something to make them realise how they are impacting others 🤬🤬🤬
